title: Executive Order 5845-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, Minnesota
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 5309, dated March 24, 1930, which withdrew the public lands in T. 62 N., R. 2 E., of the fourth principal meridian, Minnesota, pending resurvey, be, and the same is hereby, revoked.
All the lands in this township are within the limits of the Superior National Forest.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5845-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, Minnesota Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361442
